== Internet Commands ==
This page will show you how to use some commands to surf the internet, transfer files and more.

1. <nowiki>[[SSHHowto]]</nowiki> - SSH or Secure Shell is a great tool that can be used to work on remote machines. SSH also includes tools such as scp and sftp which can be used to transfer files securely between machines supporting ssh. This is an extremely useful command.
   ex: ssh localhost
